resources.string: You should select at least one mood
it must have at least 6 digits
The username or password is wrong
No connection available and no recipe stored in the device
No recipes found with your current search criteria
You must enter a name of recipe first
You must add at least one direction before to continue
You must add at least one ingredient before to continue
You must add at least one monin ingredient before to continue
You should add or take a picture before to continue
You cannot delete this Slide because is the only one that left. If you don\'t want to continue with slideshow creation press back button.
